description: Basic health endpoint for lifecycle monitoring

requirements.description: Implement a /health endpoint that returns 200 OK when service is operational and 503 when degraded/unavailable. Response must include uptime, active sandbox count, and disk usage metrics.
requirements.title: Health Check API Endpoint

validation.notes: Verify endpoint returns correct status codes for healthy/unhealthy scenarios
Validate JSON response schema includes required fields
